Yeah don't buy this. Terrible quality and not worth the money. The picture looks like the fabric is a different quality than it is. In reality, it's a really thick (not in a good way) and scratchy material. I would also recommend sizing up because the neck part is really tight and thick, and you can kind of tell in the picture if you look hard enough. The print is also standard iron-on. It feels cheap. I can probably still figure out a way to style it but it won't be very easy.

I was expecting something nice and what not, and made the mistake of purchasing without seeing the reviews, but like everyone else has said:  Smaller than expected  The graphic looks & feels cheap like an iron-on  Very stiff shirt, and didn’t have it on long but started feeling itchy with it on.  Also, I expected a much more creamy beige, but was in fact white, sadly.
Extremely thick and stiff material, fits extremely small

Just as pictured The shirt is bright white and thick quality but stock/ basic tee. The graphic appears to be a standard iron on, I was expecting a bit more texture and better quality printing. Arrived quickly though!
